## SortOrder enumeration

Represents what order the data sort by.

```csharp
public enum SortOrder
```

### Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Ascending | `1` | Sorts by ascending |
| Descending | `2` | Sorts by descending |
